headline: B&W ENGINEERING PIND PARTICLE IMPACT NOISE DETECTION SYSTEM
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Vibration and Shock
categories.lvl2: Material / Physical Testing Equipment  >  Vibration and Shock > Electrodynamic Shakers
specstable:
Manufacturer B&W Engineering
Model BWLPDB2000
Vibration Head
Model BW020
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Accessories RF noise suppressing shaker enclosure--Model BW-016
Test bench with built-in isolation base(48"W x 30"D x 28"H)--Model BW-017
Other Information Vibration:
  • Frequency: sine wave 27Hz to 250 Hz continous digital display
  • Amplitude: 0 to 20 G's peak continous digital display
  • Shaker: 50 force lbs., 0.75 in. stroke, 75 in. p/sec. velocity
  • Amplifier: 200 watts minimum
  • D.U.T. Weight: 200 grams practical limit @ 20 G's
    Shock:
  • Duration: less than 100 microseconds half sine
  • Amplitude: typical 1000+ / - 200 adjustable 0-2000 G's
  • Application: manual or auto with or without simultaneous vibration
  • Axis: same as vibration, direction opposing gravity
    Detection:
  • Acoustic transducer: -77.5 +/- 3 dB re 1 volt per ubar @ 155 +/-5 kHz
  • Amplifier: 60 +/- 2 dB @ 155 +/-5 kHz with less than 10 mV peak noise
  • Threshold: calibrated to MIL-STD requirements, adjustable 0-infinite
    Oscilloscope: 75mm CRT. 20mV per cm/div vertical
    Last calibration 1999
Power Requirements 115 V 5.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Very Good
Weight 220 lb (100 kg)
